com.complexible.common.memory

Interface HeapPool

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.complexible.common.base.Closeable

    public interface HeapPool
extends com.complexible.common.base.Closeable
    Utility class to track heap usage. FIXME Consolidate with offheap memory pools
    Author:
    Evren Sirin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allocate(long length)
      Allocates memory of given bytes if possible and returns true or false if there is not enough memory.
      void free(long length)
      Frees memory with the specified length.
      long memAllocated()
      Returns how many bytes are allocated through this pool.
      long memLeft()
      Returns how many bytes remain in the heap
      long size()
      Returns the total size of the heap.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.complexible.common.base.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        boolean allocate(long length)
        Allocates memory of given bytes if possible and returns true or false if there is not enough memory.

      • free

        void free(long length)
        Frees memory with the specified length.

      • memAllocated

        long memAllocated()
        Returns how many bytes are allocated through this pool. Note that memAllocated() + memLeft() != size() since shared memory might be allocated through another pool.

      • memLeft

        long memLeft()
        Returns how many bytes remain in the heap

      • size

        long size()
        Returns the total size of the heap.
